price: Mowͻ nnuaba pii wᴐ mu, na emu na mobɛdidie.
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
